# Model comparison
```{r}
# libraries
library(pacman)
pacman::p_load(
    tidyverse
)
```

```{r}
# load data
ntrials <- 104
relevant_cols <- c(
    "subject", "condition", "session"
)
for (n in seq_len(ntrials)) {
    relevant_cols <- c(
        relevant_cols,
        paste("log_lik[", n, "]", sep = "")
    )
}

rl_asym <- read_csv("data/rl_samples.csv") %>%
    select(relevant_cols) %>%
    mutate(
        model = "rl_asym"
    )
rl_simple <- read_csv("data/rl_simple_samples.csv") %>%
    select(relevant_cols) %>%
    mutate(
        model = "rl_simple"
    )

df <- rbind(rl_asym, rl_simple)

rm(rl_asym, rl_simple)
```

Log likelihood
```{r}
mean_log_lik <- df %>%
    group_by(
        subject,
        session,
        condition,
        model
    ) %>%
    summarise(
        across(everything(),
        list(mean))
        ) %>%
    gather(
        key = "trial",
        value = "log_lik",
        'log_lik[1]_1':'log_lik[104]_1'
    )

sd_log_lik <- df %>%
    group_by(
        subject,
        session,
        condition,
        model
    ) %>%
    summarise(
        across(everything(),
        list(sd))
        ) %>%
    gather(
        key = "trial",
        value = "sd",
        'log_lik[1]_1':'log_lik[104]_1'
    )

log_lik_df <- merge(mean_log_lik, sd_log_lik) %>%
    mutate(
        trial = as.factor(str_extract(trial, "\\d+"))
    )

rm(mean_log_lik, sd_log_lik)
```

```{r}
log_lik_df %>%
    group_by(condition, session, model) %>%
    summarize(
        mean_log_lik = mean(log_lik),
        sd = mean(sd)
    )
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = log_lik_df) +
    geom_density(
        aes(x = log_lik, fill = model),
        alpha = .5) +
    theme_bw() +
    facet_wrap(session ~ condition) +
    scale_fill_manual(values = c("orange", "purple"))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = log_lik_df) +
    geom_point(
        aes(
            x = trial, y = log_lik,
            color = model
            ),
        position = position_dodge(0.05)) +
    geom_errorbar(
        aes(
            x = trial,
            ymin = log_lik - sd,
            ymax = log_lik + sd,
            color = model
            ),
            width = .2,
            position = position_dodge(0.05)
        ) +
    theme_bw() +
    facet_wrap(. ~ subject) +
    scale_color_manual(values = c("orange", "purple"))
```
